CITY OF NEW YORK
MUNICIPAL BROADCASTING SYSTEM
MEMORANDUM
August 11, 1941
Mr.. Prank.JL..Schooleyv.Exec.utive Secretary.
The Natl.Assn.of Educational Broadcasters
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
My dear Frank;
I hate to think of the amount of
work facing me this week, hut if I get any
ideas before the 13th, 1*11 pass them on to
you.
I1m planning to attend the Convention
at Purdue so will see you there, in any event.
Very sincerely,
M. S. Novik
